name: modmail
description: Send or receive messages from a server's moderation team

options.name: message-mods
options.description: As a user, send a message to a server's moderation team

options.name: message-user
options.description: As a moderator, send a direct message from the moderation team to a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to send a message to

options.name: block
options.description: As a moderator, block a user from sending mod mail

options.name: unblock
options.description: As a moderator, unblock a user from sending mod mail

options.name: log-set
options.description: Set a channel for modmail logging (if none is set, it defaults to global moderation log channel)

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel you want modmail logged in, default current channel

options.name: log-show
options.description: Show the configuration of modmail logging in this server

options.name: log-stop
options.description: Revert to using global moderation log channel from /mod log set
